title: Audience
description: Intended audience for an item, i.e. the group for whom the item was created.

allOf.description: A utility class that serves as the umbrella for a number of 'intangible' things such as quantities, structured values, etc.

audienceType.description: The target group associated with a given audience (e.g. veterans, car owners, musicians, etc.).

geographicArea.description: The geographic area associated with the audience.
